summary: A bookseller saves a tramp from drowning and shelters him, but the tramp's odd behavior starts to wear everyone down.
cast: Michel Simon|Marcelle Hainia|Sévérine Lerczinska|Jean Gehret|Max Dalban|Jean Dasté|Charles Granval|Geneviève Cadix|Jacques Becker|Georges D'Arnoux|Régine Lutèce|Jane Pierson
keywords: comedy of manners|satire|fish out of water|rags to riches|eccentric family
title: Boudu salvado de las aguas
